title: Emprez BI Module - Late Arrivals Management
content: A multitude of factors can cause Late arrivals.Possible solutions1. Identify the problematic employees by clicking on "Employee responsible of this situation" in the Late Arrivals2. Identify the behaviour by checking the annual Lateness ratio of specific individuals3. As well as the monthly Late Arrivals history: To view data by month, click on the arrow next to the desired year.4. Verbalize your disappointment, as well as the impact on team members, the company and its customers5. Propose an action plan6. Clearly describe the consequences of not following company policies regarding delays7. Reward improvementsView the Absenteeism and Late arrivals per structure report by facility to see the history by departmentThe EMPREZ BI module is available on demand for $1.50/month/employee: request it by opening a ticket!* Available for all manager profiles (Admin, limited admin, manager, limited manager).Only the Report-BI section is not available to the manager and limited manager profiles.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
